Name: Circuit Dude
About the game: Help Circuit Dude build his ultimate secret invention by plugging in chips, pushing blocks, stepping on switches, rotating walls and so much more in this game featuring over 15 hours of gameplay over 120 levels. If that's not enough, you can design your own master contraptions using the in-game level editor and even upload it to the internet for others to try out! What is Circuit Dude building? Finish the first 100 levels to find out! FEATURES 120 Levels 15+ Hours of Puzzles 10 Cool Tile Mechanics Level Editor Online Level Sharing
